ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bow for bards!
ygData.msgSnippet: I want all/all arrows and this bow and a full set of Singing Steel so I can pass myself off as a ranger ;) hehehe ... From: Jeff Heskett
ygData.messageBody:
I want all/all arrows and this bow and a full set of Singing Steel so I can
pass myself off as a ranger ;)

hehehe
----- Original Message -----
From: "Jeff Heskett" <tarkin@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 08, 2000 9:07 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bow for bards!


> can you put this arrow in the ammo slot and keep normal ones in inventory?
>
> on my monk at least, the last ammo is never taken. if it's down to 1 on
> ammo it starts pulling from inventory. of course, i only have shurikens
on
> my monk so i don't know how mis-matched ammo types would work.
>
> pure shame skipping stones in swamp of no hope aren't stackable with their
> 200 range. those would be great for pulling for just about any class.
>
> i know, we have ranged songs, but when i tag something to pull i want it
to
> come NOW instead of when the song finally starts :)
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Randy Keith [mailto:Kalekona@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 08, 2000 6:44 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bow for bards!
>
>
> I will take a look tonight, but I believe that the Shardwing Arrow is
> All/All.
>
> Only thing is that it is Lore =)
>
>
